1: <pb/>Atzun qe aj Israel, aqeju ax otoq che itz'j tuj Judá ex otoq che pon q'i'n tu'n rey Nabucodonosor tuj Babilonia. E je'tz tuj Babilonia tu'n kyul tuj Jerusalén ex tuj Judá, ex teyle junjun o pon tuj tnam jatum otoq che najan qe kyman tnejel.
2: E ul uk'in kyu'n Zorobabel, Jesúa, Nehemías, Seraías, Reelaías, Mardoqueo, Bilsán, Mispar, Bigvai, Rehum ex Baana, ex atzun kyajlal qe xinaq aj Israel jlu:
3: <pb/>Kyxol tiyjil Paros, kab' mil tuk' jun syent tuk' 72 kyb'et;
4: <pb/>Kyxol tiyjil Sefatías, ox syent tuk' 72 kyb'et;
5: <pb/>Kyxol tiyjil Ara, wuq syent tuk' 75 kyb'et;
6: <pb/>Kyxol tiyjil Pahat-moab, ex qa te Jesúa ex Joab, kab' mil tuk' wajxaq syent tuk' kab'laj kyb'et;
7: <pb/>Kyxol tiyjil Elam, jun mil tuk' kab'e syent tuk' 54 kyb'et;
8: <pb/>Kyxol tiyjil Zatu, b'elaj syent tuk' 45 kyb'et;
9: <pb/>Kyxol tiyjil Zacai, wuq syent tuk' 60 kyb'et;
10: <pb/>Kyxol tiyjil Bani, qaq syent tuk' 42 kyb'et;
11: <pb/>Kyxol tiyjil Bebai, qaq syent tuk' 23 kyb'et;
12: <pb/>Kyxol tiyjil Azgad, jun mil tuk' kab'e syent tuk' 22 kyb'et;
13: <pb/>Kyxol tiyjil Adonicam, qaq syent tuk' 66 kyb'et;
14: <pb/>Kyxol tiyjil Bigvai, kab' mil tuk' 56 kyb'et;
15: <pb/>Kyxol tiyjil Adín, kyaje syent tuk' 54 kyb'et;
16: <pb/>Kyxol tiyjil Ater, ex qa te Ezequías, 98 kyb'et;
17: <pb/>Kyxol tiyjil Bezai, ox syent tuk' 23 kyb'et;
18: <pb/>Kyxol tiyjil Jora, jun syent tuk' kab'laj kyb'et;
19: <pb/>Kyxol tiyjil Hasum, kab' syent tuk' 23 kyb'et;
21: <pb/>Kyxol qe xinaq aj Belén, jun syent tuk' 23 kyb'et;
23: <pb/>Kyxol qe xinaq aj Anatot, jun syent tuk' 28 kyb'et;
25: <pb/>Kyxol qe xinaq aj Quiriat-jearim, aj Cafira ex aj Beerot, wuq syent tuk' 43 kyb'et;
26: <pb/>Kyxol qe xinaq aj Ramá ex aj Geba, qaq syent tuk' 21 kyb'et;
27: <pb/>Kyxol qe xinaq aj Micmas, jun syent tuk' 22 kyb'et;
28: <pb/>Kyxol qe xinaq aj Bet-el ex aj Hai, kab' syent tuk' 23 kyb'et;
30: <pb/>Kyxol qe xinaq aj Magbis, jun syent tuk' 56 kyb'et;
31: <pb/>Kyxol qe xinaq aj Elam, aju juntl Elam, jun mil tuk' kab' syent tuk' 54 kyb'et;
32: <pb/>Kyxol qe xinaq aj Harim, ox syent tuk' winqin kyb'et;
33: <pb/>Kyxol qe xinaq aj Lod, aj Hadid ex aj Ono, wuq syent tuk' 25 kyb'et;
34: <pb/>Kyxol qe xinaq aj Jericó, ox syent tuk' 45 kyb'et;
35: <pb/>Kyxol qe xinaq aj Senaa, ox mil tuk' qaq syent tuk' 30 kyb'et.
36: <pb/>Kyxol tiyjil pal Gedaías, aqeju tiyjil Jesúa, b'elaj syent tuk' 73 kyb'et;
37: <pb/>Kyxol tiyjil pal Imer, jun mil tuk' 52 kyb'et;
38: <pb/>Kyxol tiyjil pal Pasur, jun mil tuk' kab' syent tuk' 47 kyb'et;
39: <pb/>Kyxol tiyjil pal Harim, jun mil tuk' wuqlaj kyb'et.
40: <pb/>Kyxol aj Leví, aqeju tiyjil Jesúa ex Cadmiel, ax tiyjil Hodavías, 74 kyb'et.
41: <pb/>Kyxol qe xjal b'a'n che b'itzan, aqeju tiyjil Asaf, jun syent tuk' 28 kyb'et;
42: <pb/>Kyxol qe xjal in che xq'uqin ttzi tja Dios, aqeju tiyjil Salum, Ater, Talmón, Acub, Hatita, ex Sobai, japun jun syent tuk' 39 kyb'et tu'n tkyaqil.
43: <pb/>Kyxol qeju in che ajb'en tuj tja Dios, aqeju tzajni kyiyjil kyi'j qe xjal lu: Ziha, Hasufa, Tabaot,
55: <pb/>Kyxol tiyjil qe tmajen Salomón, aqeju tzajni kyiyjil kyi'j qe xjal lu: Sotai, Soferet, Peruda,
58: Atzun kyajlal kykyaqil qe ajb'el jlu tuj tja Dios, kyuk'ix kyajlal kyiyjil tmajen Salomón, ox syent tuk' 92 kyb'et.
59: <pb/>Atzun qeju e tzaj kyuj qe tnam Tel-mela, Tel-harsa, Querub, Addán ex Imer, ex minti'toq b'a'n kyu'n alkye kyxe'chel ex qa ax kyiyjil aj Israel qe, atzun qe jlu:
60: Kyxol kyiyjil Delaía, Tobías ex Necoda, qaq syent tuk' 52 kyb'et.
61: Atzun kyxol kyiyjil qe pal, atzun qe jlu: Qe tiyjil Habaía ex Cos ex Barzilai aju moje' tuk'il tme'jel jun xjal Barzilai tb'i aju aj Galaad, ex tu'ntzunju ok tb'i Barzilai.
62: Aqe jlu ku'x kyjyo'n kyb'i jatum tz'ib'an kyb'i kykyaqil kyiyjil, ex minti' knet kyb'i; tu'ntzun jlu minti' xi q'o'n kyoklen tu'n kyok te pal.
63: Atzunte gobernador xi tq'o'n orden tu'n mi'n t-xi kywa'n wab'j xjansa'maj max okxi tajb'en Urim ex Tumim tu'n jun pal, tu'ntzun tel nik'b'aj kyi'j, qa ax tok kyiyjil pal qe.
64: <pb/>Tu'n kykyaqil xjal lu japun jun kyajlal te 42 mil tuk' ox syent tuk' 60 kyb'aj.
65: Ex part kyajlal qe kymajen xinaq ex kymajen xu'j; attoq wuq mil tuk' ox syent tuk' 37 kyb'et. Ax ikx attoq kab' syent b'itzal, xinaq ex xu'j.
66: Ax ikx attoq wuq syent tuk' 36 kychej cabay, kab' syent tuk' 45 kychej mul,
67: ex kyaje syent tuk' 35 kychej camey ex qaq mil tuk' wuq syent tuk' winqin kychej bur.
68: <pb/>Attoq junjun nejenel kye junjun k'loj aj Israel at kyxilen kyxolx, tej kypon tuj tja Dios tuj Jerusalén, xi kyq'o'n kyoyaj tu'n kyex kygan tu'n tjaw b'inchet juntl maj tja Dios.
69: Ex xi kyq'o'n kyoyaj tu'n tajb'en ti'j tja Dios, noq nik'pun jaku knet tu'n junjun. Chmet junlaj quintal q'an pwaq, 60 quintal saq pwaq, ex jun syent ẍjo'w in che ajb'en kyu'n pal.
70: Qe pal, qe aj Leví ex junjuntl xjal, qe b'itzal, qe xq'uqil ttzi tja Dios ex qe ajb'el tuj tja Dios, e je'x najal kyuj kytanmi, ex qe txqantl aj Israel ax ikx e je'x kye najal kyuj kytanmi.
